22270.<if_woman>「ありがとう…… <pc>ちゃん……！\n この試練を 乗り:
Thank you... <pc>...! If I get
through this trial... I can become...a great
sage too...right...?

22272.<if_woman>「シェリル……。私なら…大丈夫……。\n それよりも…今 <:
Cheryl... I'll be...fine... But more
importantly... now <pc> wants to
fight with me...

22273.「行こう カルサドラ火山へ……。\n 呪いなんか さっさと おさらばして\n も:
Let's go to Calsadora Volcano... and let's get
rid of the curse and get back to what we were
before...

22275.「<pc> それでは よろしく頼む。\n われらの決戦の地 カルサドラ火山の入口:
, then I look forward to working with you. The entrance to Calsadora Volcano, the site of our decisive battle, is southeast
of Goble Desert East.

22276.「火山に入ったら 第１層を道なりに進み\n 南側の空洞に行ってくれ。私は 術の準:
Once you enter the volcano, follow the path through Level 1 to the cavity on the south side. I'm heading there ahead of you to
prepare for the surgery.

22277.「……心の闇に目をつけた 呪いの主は\n 狡猾で残忍な 強敵に ちがいない。\n:
The Lord of the Curse, who has set his eyes on
the heart's darkness, must be a cunning,
cruel, and powerful foe. Come with caution.

22278.「アーニアは 私が カルサドラ火山まで\n 連れていくから 心配いらん。\n キ:
Don't worry, I'll take Anya to Calsadora
Volcano. You just focus on killing the enemy.

22279.「アーニアと シェリル……。\n ふたりの 最後の戦いだ……！\n 頼むぞ <p:
Anya and Cheryl, it's the last battle between
you two...! Come on, <pc>!

22281.「ぅぅ…うぐぐ……。我は 闇……。: Ugh... ugh... I am the darkness...

22283.「ここへ着くなり アーニアが豹変してな。\n いよいよ 本当に 限界が来たらしい:
Anya changed as soon as we got here. It seems
she's really reached her limit...

22284.「シェリルッ！！ <cs_pchero>が 来たぞ！\n 時間がない！ 早く 術:
Cheryl! <cs_pchero> is here! There's no
time! Quickly, mesmerize her!

22285.「アーニア 見ていてくれ……。\n 私の手で この呪われた運命に\n 終止符を打:
Anya, watch and see... with my own hands I
will put an end to this accursed destiny...!

22289.「なっ……！ そんな…… 術が効かない！？\n なぜだ！ 私では ダメなのか！？:
No...! Oh, no... the magic doesn't work! Why?
! Am I not good enough?

22290.<center>ムハハハハハッ……。無駄だ 小娘。\n貴様程度の魔力では アーニ:
It's no use, little girl. You can't pull me
out of the rootedness in Anya's heart with
your magical power.

22291.「まさか 呪いの主が……！？: No way, the Lord of the curse...!

22292.<center>いかにも……。完全なる支配まで あとわずか。\nさあ 余に聞かせ:
How very... close we are to complete domination. Now, let me hear you. Let me hear the cries of agony as my friend, who has
fallen to the Dark Sage, slaughters me!

22293.「ゥ…ウウ……。\n ……シェ…リ…ル……。\n もういちど…… 術を…使って…:
Uh... uh... she... li... le... use... your...
magic... again... Use... your... magic...

22295.<center>むぅ……？ アーニアめ こしゃくな……。\nまだ 余に 逆らうか:
Hmm...? Anya, you little brat... you still
dare to defy me...

22296.「かろうじて ヤツを…おさえているわ……。\n これが ラストチャンスよ……。\:
I barely have him under control and this is
our last chance to try one more time. I'm
gonna...

22297.「ダメだ……。私の術なんて 無駄だ！\n きっと また 失敗するに決まっている！:
No... my jutsu is useless! I'm sure it will
fail again! I'm... helpless!

22298.「ううん シェリル……。\n あなたは 無力なんかじゃない……。\n それに……:
No, Cheryl... you're not helpless... and
you're not...

22299.「私のことも もうちょっと\n 頼りにしてほしいな……。: I wish you could count on me a little more...

22304.「チィィッ ぬかったわ！\n アーニアに まだ こんなチカラが\n 残っていよう:
You got me! I didn't think Anya still had this
kind of power!

22305.「貴様が 呪いの主か……！: You are the Lord of the Curse!

22306.「ムハハハハハ……。いかにも……。\n 余は 魔賢者アクバー……。\n この世に:
Mwahahahahahaha... indeed... I am the Sorcerer
Blackmar... and it's been hundreds of years
since I first appeared in this world.

22307.「なぜ アーニアに とりついた！？\n 貴様の目的は なんだ！: Why do you haunt Anya? What is your purpose?

22308.「ムァハハハ……。余に とりつかれ\n 狂気の世界に堕ちた 闇賢者たちは\n 余:
The dark sages who are possessed by me and
have fallen into madness have become my
faithful servants.

22309.「そうして 世界中の賢者を 闇賢者に変え\n 余の支配する世界を 創造するのだ！:
Then I will turn all the wise men of the world
into Dark Sages and create a world that I will
rule! That is my ambition!

22310.「アーニアは 最高の駒になるはずだった……。\n 今まで 闇賢者に堕ちた者を は:
Anya was going to be the best pawn... she had
a hidden power that far surpassed those who
had fallen to the Dark Sage.

22311.「アーニアを 闇賢者にすれば\n 野望の成就に さらに近づいたというに……！\n:
If you had made Anya a Dark Sage, you would
have been even closer to fulfilling your
ambition! Cheryl... because of you...!

22312.「ムァーハッハッハ！ だがな……\n じつは アーニアよりも 優れた駒を\n す:
Mwahahahaha! But the truth is, I've already
found a better piece than Anya...

22314.「シェリルと アーニアに宿っていたときから\n その秘めたるチカラに 目をつけて:
I have had my eye on your hidden power ever
since you were in Cheryl and Anya's lives. You
will be the most powerful dark sage of all.

22315.「さあ！ 余に その心をよこせ！\n 闇賢者へと 身を堕とし 余の腹心として\n:
Come on! Give me your heart! You may be proud
to have degraded yourself to the Dark Sage and
serve me as my liege!

22316.「ムハハハハ……。なかなかやるな シェリル。\n だが そろそろ 貴様の相手も飽:
Mwahahahahaha... You're pretty good, Cheryl.
But I'm getting tired of dealing with you.
Let's ease you out of this...

22319.「ムハーッハッハ！ 取り逃がしたかと思ったら\n 貴様のほうから のこのこ やっ:
Mwahahaha! Just when I thought I'd lost you,
you come along and drag me away! Good, good,
good! That's what I'm talking about!

22320.「さあ！ 余に その心をよこせ！\n 闇賢者へと 身を堕とし 余の腹心として\n:
Come on! Give me your heart! You may be proud
to have degraded yourself to the Dark Sage and
serve me as my liege!

22321.「なん…だと……？ 余…が 敗北……？\n 世界…創…造の……野望…が……。\n:
What...? I... have... been... defeated? The
world... creator...'s... ambition... is...
ah... ah... Aah!

22323.「終わった……。\n 私たちの戦いが ついに……。: It's over... our fight is finally over.

22326.「す…すまない……。\n 感謝の気持ちで いっぱいなのだが……。:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm so grateful for your
help, but...

22327.「私は アーニアと ちがって\n こんなとき なんて言葉をかけていいか\n わか:
Unlike Anya, I don't know what to say at a
time like this.

22328.「とりあえず…… ありがとう。\n ……で いいだろうか？: For now... thank you. Is that okay?

22329.「アーニアなら ティーザさんに連れられ\n ひと足先に 研究院に戻ったよ。\n:
Anya went back to the institute with Tiza. She
was exhausted and in a dangerous state.

22330.「……思えば\n アーニアの呪いを 引き受けたときから\n 私は 愚かな行為を繰:
I have been repeating my foolish acts ever
since I assumed the curse of Anya...

22331.「おのれを過信し 誰の言葉にも 耳を貸さず\n あまつさえ…… ただひとりの親友:
He was so overconfident in himself that he
didn't listen to a word anyone said, and he
didn't even trust his only friend.

22332.「まだ幼き 私とアーニアが\n 王立研究院の門を たたいたとき\n ティーザさん:
When a very young Anya and I walked through
the doors of the Royal Academy, Ms. Tiza said
to us...

22333.「あまたの愚かしさの先に\n まことの賢なる道が ひらかれていると……。:
Beyond all the foolishness, the true and wise
path is open...

22334.「アーニアは 知っていたのかもしれないな。\n その 愚かしさを越えるには\n:
Maybe Anya knew that. Maybe Arnia knew that to
overcome her stupidity, she needed a friend to
believe in her...

22335.「……アーニアのことが 心配だ。\n すまないが 先に 研究院に戻っている。\n:
I'm worried about Anya. I'm sorry, but I'm
going back to the institute first. <You can
come back later.

22336.「<cs_pchero>……。私は 幸せだ。\n こんな私を 待っていてくれる人:
<cs_pchero>... I am happy. I have someone
waiting for me like this...

22338.「シェリルから 聞いたよ！\n 呪いの主を やっつけてくれたんだってね！\n 私:
Cheryl told me about you! She said you
defeated the Lord of the Curse! That cheered
me up!

22339.<if_woman>「やっぱり <pc>ちゃんは スゴイよ！\n ホントに ホン:
I knew that was great! Really, really, really! I'm so glad I found you! I knew it! Really, really, really!
I'm so glad I found you!

22341.「今しがた 緊急で 研究院会議が開かれてな。\n 魔賢者アクバーの存在と それを:
There was an emergency meeting of the Institute just now. We discussed the existence of the Sorcerer Blackmar and your success in
defeating him.

22342.「賢者の未来を おびやかす 魔賢者アクバーを\n 見事 打ち滅ぼした キミの功績:
We commend you for your successful defeat of
Blackmar, the Sorcerer Blackmar, who
threatened the future of the sages...

22343.「名誉ある賢者にのみ贈られる 賢者の証を\n キミに授与することが 満場一致で決:
It is unanimously decided that you shall
receive the Legion of Merit, which is given
only to the most honored of sages!

22344.「本来なら 国を挙げ 式典を開くところだが\n 忙しいキミの身を案じ 私が授与を:
I would have held a state ceremony, but I was
ordered to give it to you for your own good.
Now, take it!

22345.「王立研究院から 特別に贈られた\n この報酬を 受け取ってくれ。:
Accept this reward, specially presented to you
by the Royal Academy of Sciences.

22346.「<pc>よ。キミの活躍には\n 本当に 目を 見張るものがあった。:
<pc>. You have been a real eye-
opener.

22347.「だが 賢なる道の扉は 開かれたばかりだ。\n これに おごることなく 宇宙の理:
But the door to the path of wisdom has just been opened. Don't be complacent, but pursue the truth of the universe and train yourself
to be a sage.

22348.「ねえ シェリル……？\n あなた 研究院に戻ってくるんでしょ？\n また 一緒:
Hey, Cheryl...? You're coming back to the
institute, right? We can study together again!

22349.「いや……。\n 私は ここに戻るつもりはない。: No I'm not going back here.

22350.「そんな……！ どうしてっ！？\n 一緒に 大賢者になるんじゃなかったの？\n:
Oh, no...! What are you doing? I thought we
were going to become the wisest one together.
Are you still thinking about something?

22351.「ふっ。カン違いするな。\n 大賢者になる夢を あきらめたつもりはない。\n 私:
Huh. Don't get me wrong. I'm not giving up on
my dream of becoming a great sage. I just...

22352.「研究院の中と外で 別々のものを学びとり\n それを 互いに教え合っていくのが\:
I thought that learning different things inside and outside the institute, and teaching them to each other, would be a shortcut to
becoming a great sage.

22353.「ふたりなら できる…… だろ？: You two can do it... right?

22355.「そうだね。今の私たちなら 離れてたって\n 同じ夢を 見られるはずだもん！:
Yes, that's right. We can have the same dream
even if we are far away from each other!

22356.「それでは 私は 行くよ。\n またな アーニア……。:
Well then, I'll be going. See you later,
Anya...

22357.「<pc>も……\n また どこかで出会えると いいな。:
<pc> too...hope we can meet again
somewhere.
